title.home: DailyForever - Secure Encrypted Pastebin & File Sharing | Zero-Knowledge Platform
title.register: Create Account - Join DailyForever | Secure Platform
title.privacy: Privacy Policy | DailyForever - Your Data Protected

description.home: DailyForever is the most secure encrypted pastebin and file sharing platform. Share text and files with zero-knowledge encryption, end-to-end security, and no data collection. Free & anonymous.
description.paste_create: Create encrypted pastes with military-grade security. Your content is encrypted client-side before sending. Features include password protection, expiration dates, and one-time view options.
description.file_create: Upload and share files securely with end-to-end encryption. Files up to 100MB encrypted client-side. Zero-knowledge architecture ensures only you and your recipients can decrypt.
description.how_it_works: Learn how DailyForever's zero-knowledge encryption protects your data. Understand client-side encryption, key management, and why we can't read your content.
description.faq: Find answers to common questions about DailyForever's encrypted pastebin service. Learn about security features, privacy protection, and how to use our platform.
description.privacy: DailyForever's privacy policy explains our zero-knowledge architecture, no-logs policy, and commitment to protecting your data. We never track, monitor, or store your content.
description.blog: Stay updated with the latest security tips, privacy news, and platform updates from DailyForever. Learn best practices for secure communication and data protection.
description.roadmap: Explore upcoming features and improvements planned for DailyForever. See our commitment to continuous security enhancements and user-requested features.
description.philosophy: Discover DailyForever's core philosophy: privacy is a fundamental right. Learn about our mission to provide secure, anonymous communication tools for everyone.

footer.description: Zero‑knowledge encryption. No data collection. Complete privacy protection.

login.hint_backup: Backup code detected - this will change after login
login.hint_password: Password detected - enter your account password
login.placeholder_srp: Enter your password for SRP authentication
login.placeholder_default: Enter your password or 16-character backup code
login.srp_failed_try_again: Please try again or use regular login.
login.srp_desc: Maximum security: Your password never leaves your device. Uses SRP-6a protocol for zero-knowledge authentication.
login.input_hint_default: Enter your password or backup code above
login.tip_text: Tip: Enter your password normally, or paste a 16-character backup code
login.recover_link: Forgot your PIN? Recover your account

common.privacy_desc: Zero‑knowledge encryption. No data collection. Complete privacy protection.
common.share_link_warning: Your share link contains the decryption key after the #. Keep it private.
common.security_pillars: End-to-end encrypted • Zero-knowledge • No server access to content
common.share_link_never_leaves: Your share link contains the decryption key after the # and never leaves your browser.

qr.use_camera: Use your phone camera to open the link

common.expires_simple: How long should we keep it?
common.security_simple: 🔒 Your text is encrypted before leaving your device
common.private_label: Private (visible only to you when logged in)

create.hero_title: Secure Paste Sharing. Private by design.
create.section_desc: Your content is encrypted client-side before sending. Zero-knowledge architecture ensures complete privacy.
create.placeholder: Start typing or paste text… It will be encrypted before sending.
create.placeholder_simple:
Type or paste your text here...

Your text will be encrypted instantly and only people with your link can read it.
create.tip_shortcut: Tip: Press Ctrl/⌘ + Enter to create the paste

guest.title: Guest Mode
guest.message: You're creating a paste as a guest.
guest.link: Register or login to access more features

create.password_note: Optional password adds an extra layer of access control

result.title: Paste Created Successfully
result.identifier_note: Share this short ID with support/admins for moderation. Never share the key if you want to keep the paste private.

create.recipient_placeholder: Leave empty to use link-only mode
create.recipient_note: If set, the paste will be encrypted specifically for this user. The server never sees your content.

show.title: Secure Paste
show.owner_note_text: This is the encrypted content. To decrypt it, you need the encryption key from the share URL (the part after #).
show.use_share_url: use the share URL with key

decrypting.title: Decrypting content...
decrypting.desc: Please wait while we decrypt your content client-side.
decrypting.note: Zero-knowledge: the key stays in your URL fragment and is never sent to the server.

password_gate.protected: This paste is protected by a password.

error.title: Decryption Failed
error.desc1: Unable to decrypt this paste. The encryption key may be missing or invalid.
error.desc2: Make sure you're using the complete URL including the fragment after #
error.label: Paste key (hex) to decrypt

edit.title: Edit Paste
edit.desc: Edit your encrypted paste. Changes will be encrypted client-side before saving.
edit.placeholder: Paste your content here... It will be encrypted before sending.
edit.password_note: If set, password is verified server-side (Argon2id). Content remains end‑to‑end encrypted.

private.label: Make this paste private
private.help: Private pastes are only visible to you

edit.confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

mine.title: My Pastes
mine.subtitle: Manage your encrypted pastes
mine.create_first_paste: Create your first paste to get started
mine.confirm_delete: Delete this file? This cannot be undone.
mine.confirm_delete_paste: Are you sure you want to delete this paste? This action cannot be undone.
mine.delete_error_retry: Error deleting paste. Please try again.

not_found.title: Paste Not Found
not_found.desc: This paste either doesn't exist, has expired, or the URL is incomplete.
not_found.issue_expired: • The paste has expired and been automatically deleted
not_found.issue_missing_key: • The URL is missing the encryption key fragment (part after #)
not_found.issue_mistyped: • The paste ID was mistyped or corrupted
not_found.issue_never_created: • The paste was never created successfully

create.hero_title: Upload encrypted files. Private by design.
create.section_desc: Your file is encrypted client-side before uploading. Zero-knowledge architecture ensures complete privacy.

dropzone.drag: Drag a file here, or browse from your device
dropzone.limit: Up to 160 MB — Client‑side encrypted • Zero‑knowledge
dropzone.simple: Drop your file here or click to browse
dropzone.simple_desc: Any file up to 160 MB • Encrypted instantly

view_limit.label: View limit (optional)
view_limit.note: File will be deleted after this many downloads

result.title: File Uploaded Successfully
result.identifier_note: Share this short ID with support/admins for moderation. Never share the key if you want to keep the file private.

create.recipient_note: If set, the file key is wrapped to the recipient using their ML‑KEM prekey so they can download without the URL key.

kem.title: Recipient Key Required
kem.desc: This file is addressed using {{alg}}. Import your ML‑KEM secret key (base64) for key ID {{kid}} to download without a URL key.
kem.desc_part2: Import your ML‑KEM secret key (base64) for key ID
kem.desc_part3: to download without a URL key.

mine.title: My Files
mine.confirm_delete: Delete this file? This cannot be undone.

index.title: Blog
index.tagline: Privacy & Security Insights. Zero‑knowledge, encryption, and safe sharing.

twofa.title: Two‑Factor Authentication
twofa.subtitle: Enter the 6‑digit code from your authenticator app

register.header_subtitle: Join DailyForever for secure, encrypted pastes
register.username_hint: 3-64 characters. This will be visible to others.
register.password_hint: At least 8 characters. Use a strong, unique password.
register.pin_hint: Choose a 4-8 digit PIN for quick access and recovery.

srp.title: SRP Authentication
srp.desc: Enable SRP (Secure Remote Password) authentication. Your password never leaves your device - only cryptographic proofs are sent to the server.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.text_prefix: By creating an account, you agree to our
privacy.text_suffix: Your data is encrypted with zero-knowledge architecture.

empty.title: No Activity Yet
empty.desc: Start creating pastes to see your activity analytics

index.title: One-time prekeys
index.subtitle: Generate ML-KEM one-time public keys locally. Private keys never leave your browser. Export and import to move devices.
index.gen_hint: Keys are generated in your browser. Only public keys are uploaded.
index.bundle_desc: Paste or drop a bundle of public keys for upload.
index.export_hint: Export your secret keys to a file and import them on another device. Secrets are stored in your browser's local storage under keys like pq.prekeys.<kid>.sk.
index.empty: No keys yet. Generate some above.

all.title: All prekeys
all.subtitle: Filter, search, and perform bulk actions on your one-time prekeys.

modal.subtitle_import: Restore keys from a backup file
modal.paste_json: Paste JSON here, or drop your exported file:

support.title: Support Center
support.subtitle: Get help, report issues, or contact our team. We're here to assist you with any questions or concerns.

form.title: Submit a Report

form.email_help: We'll use this to respond to your report. If not provided, we'll respond through this page.

abuse.identifier_help: The 6-character identifier of the content you want to report

dmca.desc: Report copyright infringement. Include the paste identifier and detailed information about the copyrighted work.

abuse.desc: Report content that violates our Acceptable Use Policy, including illegal, harmful, or inappropriate content.

security.title: Security Issue
security.desc: Report security vulnerabilities, suspicious activity, or potential security threats.

appeal.desc: Appeal content removal or account restrictions that you believe were made in error.

how.subtitle: A comprehensive technical overview of our zero-knowledge encryption system and data protection mechanisms.

philosophy.banner_title: Privacy and Encryption as Universal Human Rights

banner.title: 🍪 Cookie Consent
banner.desc: We use essential cookies to ensure our website functions properly and analytics cookies to help us improve your experience. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. You can customize your preferences or learn more in our Privacy Policy.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.desc: Used to track visitors across websites for advertising purposes

backup.title: Save Your Backup Code
backup.subtitle: This is your backup code. Save it in a safe place - you can use it to log in if you forget your PIN.
backup.label: Backup Code:
backup.note: This code will change every time you log in. Make sure to save it in a secure location like a password manager.

file.note: This code will change every time you log in. Save it in a secure location like a password manager.
file.usage: You can use this code to log in if you forget your PIN.

index.subtitle: Manage users, permissions, and account status

notice.title: Privacy Notice
notice.text: Administrative access is limited to account metadata only. We cannot access encrypted content due to our zero-knowledge architecture. All administrative actions are logged for audit purposes.

index.empty: No users found matching your criteria.
